title: Blue Archive "Millennium Quest"
description: An epic RPG created a long time ago by the Millennium Science School's Game Development Department - Millennium Quest.

command-selection.title: Command Selection Keybinds
command-selection.back: Go back to the previous menu.

take.description: Take an item from around you.

escape.name: Escape
escape.description: Escape from the enemy (may not always be possible).

notice.title: Notice
notice.notice-1: It may take some time for the game to start up. Please wait, even if the screen turns black for a short time.
notice.notice-2: The game does not have any save data. Progress is not saved across reloads.

deprecated-os.title: Deprecated OS
deprecated-os.description: The following operating systems are deprecated.

archive.title: Copyright Notice
archive.description: This website serves as a public archive of the Blue Archive-themed game "Millennium Quest" released in April 2023.

copyright-notice: The game, as well as all the assets distributed through this website are the property of NEXON Games Co., Ltd. and Yostar, Inc. This website is not affiliated with the aforementioned companies in any way. For takedown requests, please write an email to jozsef@sallai.me.
